net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.util.io

Class ResourceLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.util.io.ResourceLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class ResourceLoader
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    A class which provides a visualization of base resource loading progress as a splash screen. Base resources include Sprites, Font names, and Sounds. All other resources are based off of these three.
    Since:
    May 24, 2016, 2:24:32 PM
    Author:
    Christian Bryce Alexander
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
